articles.author: Jacinta Bowler
articles.title: This Bacterium Survived on The Outside of The Space Station For a Whole Damn Year - ScienceAlert
articles.description: A year in space is no walk in the park. Just ask Scott Kelly, the American astronaut who spent a year on the International Space Station (ISS) in 2015.
articles.content:
A year in space is no walk in the park. Just ask Scott Kelly, the American astronaut who spent a year on the International Space Station (ISS) in 2015.
